## Introduction
Hello! We're conducting research to improve our [product/service]. Your feedback will help us better serve your needs. This survey takes about 7-10 minutes to complete.

1. How often do you use [product/service]?

   _____________________

   _____________________

   - Quality
   - Price
   - Durability
   - Ease of use
   - Design/appearance

   - Higher quality materials
   - Longer lifespan
   - Local production
   - Eco-friendly materials
   - Energy efficiency
   - Recyclable packaging
   - None of the above

## Part 3: Usage Patterns & Pain Points
9. Where do you typically use [product/service]?
   - Home
   - Work
   - On-the-go
   - Other: _____

    - [Common problem 1]
    - [Common problem 2]
    - [Common problem 3]
    - Other (please specify): _____

11. How do you dispose of [product/service] when you're done with it?
    - Throw in regular trash
    - Recycle
    - Return to manufacturer
    - Donate/give away
    - Other: _____

    - Recyclable materials
    - Energy-saving features

    - Price
